MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH4, EH29 and EH30 postcode areas of South Queensferry, West Lothian and Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.30pm. Our emergency response team have arrived on site to locate and repair the unplanned fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20pm on Monday 8th February 2021.
